name: Macgo iPhone Explorer for Mac
short_description: Macgo Free iPhone Explorer for Mac is a free iOS file explore software, it is designed to access, explore and manage your iOS file system with or without jailbreaking. With the freeware, you can easily add and delete all types of file saved on your iOS devices. Moreover, it allows you to copy all types of files between your Mac and iOS devices, it's also an easy and safe software to operate with. 1.Features Overview Free access, explore and manage iOS devices iPhone Explorer for Mac is a free and safe iPhone browser software which can give you a full command of file system on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. It helps to easily access and manage multiple iOS files with or without jailbreaking the device. No matter it's an iPhone 5s, iPad mini or iPod touch5, they are all instantly accessible with this freeware. 2.Enable to manage your files in iOS devices The iPhone Explorer gives you the power to add or delete whatever files you need to modify, so you can make your own decisions about how
summary: Macgo Free iPhone Explorer for Mac is a free iOS file explore software
